title: Social Media Buzz: From A News Anchor's Suit To Anonymous
teaser: We look at some of the news reverberating online, including a story that shows no one notices what male TV anchors wear.
contentencoded:
Annie Colbert, viral content editor for Mashable, joins Here & Now‘s Robin Young to look at some of the stories reverberating online:

  • A male Australian television anchor wore the same suit for a whole year and no one noticed. He says he was frustrated by how female anchors are criticized and judged for what they wear.
  • The activist hacker group Anonymous took over the KKK’s Twitter account, after apparent threats from the group directed at protesters in Ferguson, Missouri.
  • A video of a woman rapping in the car to Salt-N-Peppa — secretly recorded by her husband — goes viral.
  • World leaders cozy up with koalas at G20 Summit.

[Youtube]

Guest

  • Annie Colbert, viral content editor at the news and social media website Mashable. She tweets @anniecolbert.
